triples.name: Ising model
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a nonreciprocal generalization of the classical Ising model with novel phase transitions.

triples.name: Phase transition
triples.relevance: The paper studies phase transitions in the nonreciprocal Ising model using numerical and analytical methods.

triples.name: Mean-field theory
triples.relevance: Mean-field equations are used as one of the analytical approaches to predict stable homogeneous phases.

triples.name: Classical XY model
triples.relevance: The critical exponents change from Ising to XY universality class in three dimensions.

triples.name: Critical exponent
triples.relevance: The paper characterizes how nonreciprocity changes critical exponents from Ising to XY universality.

triples.name: Thermodynamic limit
triples.relevance: The paper analyzes the fate of uniform nonreciprocal phases in the thermodynamic limit of large systems.

triples.name: Active matter
triples.relevance: Active matter systems are mentioned as a context where nonreciprocal interactions with globally ordered oscillations are observed.

triples.name: Topological defect
triples.relevance: The paper discovers spiral defects as topological defects that destroy the swap phase in two dimensions.
